name: GS to WP
author: Jacques Malgrange

sections.description:
This lightweight plugin allows to import pages and media from GetSimple CMS to WordPress.
Internal links from page to page are also migrate.
Pages can be imported as page or post format.
Menu is also created.
sections.installation:
Install and Activate

  1. Unzip the downloaded gs2wp.zip file
  2. Upload the gs2wp folder and its contents into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation
  3. Activate GetSimple to WordPress from Plugins page
sections.faq:
Import Page

  • Copy the /data/ folder that is located in your GetSimple root.
  • Paste it into the wp-content/uploads/ folder of your WordPress.

When done, you can remove the /data/ folder and remove the plugin.

You can insert as many page as you want.
